resources.string: Grain Vision 2021 v1 adalah aplikasi kecerdasan buatan pendeteksi jenis gandum. \n untuk penggunaannya Upload foto dengan mengklik icon photo, aplikasi akan secara otomatis mendeteksi jenis gandum sesuai dengan foto yang di upload "
Setelah foto selesai di upload, maka aplikasi akan secara otomatis mengenerate angka statistik "
Secara otomatis hasil dari tampilan akan tersimpan di history
Berikut Contoh posisi beras yang benar untuk meningkatkan akurasi"
Contoh posisi beras yang benar \n untuk mendapatkan hasil dan akurasi yang maksimal"

The Grain Vision is an artificial intelligence application that can analyze the quality and variety of grains. \nThis application is very easy to use, users only need to take a photo of grain by click photo icon and then upload the photo or select from photo gallery. This application will automatically generate reports grain types and varieties

To generate valid data and improve accuracy, the grains need to be placed on a dark background (black, dark blue, dark green or dark red) and at distance from each other. \nNote : a white or bright background will make the data inaccurate and invalid
After the photo is uploaded, the application will automatically generate report of grain analysis
The results will be stored in history and to view historical data, user only needs to click on date to be displayed
